text: Maxwell Holt (born March 12, 1987) is an American volleyball player, a member of United States men's national volleyball team and Italian club Vero Volley Monza. He was the 2013 NORCECA Champion, gold medalist of the 2014 World League and 2015 World Cup. He won the bronze medal at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==Career== ===National team=== Holt was a member of the U.S. Junior Men's National Team from 2005-2007. He played in the Four Nations Tournament in 2005, the NORCECA Men's Junior Continental Championship in 2006, and the FIVB Volleyball Men's U21 World Championship where the team took seventh. Holt joined the National Team in 2009, debuting in the Pan American Cup. In September 2013 USA, including Holt, won the NORCECA Championship.U.S. Men Win 2013 NORCECA Championship – teamusa.org – September 28, 2013 On July 20, 2014 he won the gold medal of World League 2014.USA upset Brazil to claim second World League title – fivb.org – July 20, 2014 ==Sporting achievements== * CEV Cup ** 16px 2014/2015 – with Dynamo Moscow * CEV Challenge Cup ** 16px 2012/2013 –
